resources.string:
To continue, please install the Watch Face on your watch by clicking on the install button below.

When installed and launched on your Watch, use the Sync button bellow to sync your premium status and enable widgets and weather display.

If you have any issue, please contact me using the menu.

You can setup widgets and weather display on your watch, using the Watch Face settings!

Use the Sync button bellow to sync your premium status to your watch if needed.

If you have any issue, please contact me using the menu.
Looking for the Watch Face on your watch to sync premium status…

>> Make sure you installed Pixel Minimal Watch Face on your Watch! <<

You can setup widgets, weather display and other options directly on your watch!

If you have any issue, please contact me using the menu.
Thank you so much for your support :)

Unable to reach PlayStore to verify your premium status.

Please check your connection and try again.
(%s)
>> First, download the Watch Face for free on your watch <<
If you want to unlock widgets and weather, become a premium user:
An error occurred while syncing with your watch. Please check connection and try again.\n(%s)
An error occurred while processing your payment. Please check your connection and try again.\n(%s)
An error occurred, check your connection and try again later.
4 customisable widgets and weather info, beautifully integrated
Welcome into Pixel Minimal Watch Face companion app
This companion phone app is here to help you becoming premium to unlock widgets and weather.\n\nIf you have any issue, please contact me using the app menu for support.

An error occurred opening the PlayStore on your Watch.

Install the Watch Face on your watch manually by searching on your watch's PlayStore:
"Pixel Minimal Watch Face"

(Be careful not to install another watch face by mistake called "Pixel Watch Face", it's nearly the same name!)
Feel like helping even more with a tip?
Your %s tip means so much to me, your support really helps a lot!\n\nThank you very much <3
An error occurred while processing your donation (%s).\nPlease contact me at pixelwatchface@benoitletondor.com for assistance. Many thanks!
Unable to contact the PlayStore for donation details (%s).\n\nPlease try again later or contact me using the menu.
I\'m an indie developer, making Pixel Minimal Watch Face on my free time, open source, doing my best to provide a great experience.
By being premium you\'re already supporting a lot but if you feel like donating a bit more, it would really help!
